steps.title: Prepare a 'double boiler.'
steps.content: Prepare a 'double boiler.' If you do not have one, add a clean jar, such as a jelly jar, in a pot of water. Do not start boiling your water yet.

steps.title: Crumble your feta.
steps.content: Crumble your feta. Use small, but not tiny chunks.

steps.title: Add a small amount of preferably full milk to your jar and drop in your feta.
steps.content: Add a small amount of preferably full milk to your jar and drop in your feta. You can use skim or 2% if you prefer.

steps.title: Now turn your stove on to medium heat and allow water to boil.
steps.content: Now turn your stove on to medium heat and allow water to boil.

steps.title: As it heats up, stir it constantly.
steps.content: As it heats up, stir it constantly.

steps.title: Now you've got a feta cheese sauce!
steps.content: Now you've got a feta cheese sauce!

steps.title: Add a little cornstarch to thicken, or add water to thin it out.
steps.content: Add a little cornstarch to thicken, or add water to thin it out.
